metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5168 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: A compromised content process could have provided malicious data to`FilterNodeD2D1` resulting in an out-of-bounds write, leading to apotentially exploitable crash in a privileged process. *This bug onlyaffects Firefox on Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.* Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 118, Firefox ESR < 115.3, and Thunderbird <115.3.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
